html:
9.5.17  11:25 am   how 2 do the music

     try a way no one else has tried before

9.5.17  9:13 am   How did the universe get created when there was nothing anywhere to start with? Can matter be created from nothing?

     anything can happen. the universe is one of those things

9.5.17  8:33 am   what do i do if i have a cool melody in my head but cant figure out a harmony that fits it

     keep trying, i guess

9.5.17  6:48 am   Have you ever considered going back to your shorter songs and jingles and extending them to longer songs (maybe with videos) or would you prefer to draw a line under them and focus on new stuff going forward?

     it is generally more responsible to do unrecorded material, but there are a few vines that were released that i've added to the list because i think they would be good for longer songs

9.5.17  2:26 am   Usually when I play music, I feel lost and clunky and like I have no idea what I'm doing and I usually dislike what I play. But, if I bring my instruments into bed with me and play random whatever-comes-into-my-head while falling asleep, it sounds good. What's more surprising, if I record that and listen back later, I still think it sounds good. I'm trying to figure out why, and how to learn from my tired tunes to translate my sleepy success into awake awesomeness. I was hoping you may be able to advise me on how to bridge this gap.

      sounds like you need a sense of direction. when you're going to sleep, you know what the agenda is. try playing music while you're on an important voyage

9.5.17  2:11 am   i get the sense that youre probably against personality tests, astrology, and other THIS IS WHO I AM tests which some people use to segment their personality into tiny boxes instead of Being The Human They Are. but have you ever looked into this stuff just for kicks? it can be silly and fun if you dont take it seriously

     i take personality very seriously

9.5.17  2:11 am   Could you ever imagine yourself in sort of a directors position? Like where you direct/lead a team of animators/music composers to make videos/music as you see fit?

     yes

     Or is that just killing the creative process for you?

9.5.17  1:30 am   Is free will an illusion?

     no

9.4.17  11:34 pm   What kind of sauce is the best sauce?

     scientists are trying to figure that out

9.4.17  10:59 pm   Is milk okay?

     i think so

9.4.17  10:17 pm   is "you're free to do whatever you want to" a sequel or spiritual successor to "tuesday"?

     no, it was actually written many years before 'tuesday' was written

9.4.17  8:12 pm   Will the next video be a music video?

     yes

9.4.17  7:42 pm   You said you've been playing music since you were very young... have you always been passionate about making videos too? Or did that not really come along until you started to put together this website and you wanted something to go along with your music?

     it didn't really occur to me that it was feasible until a bit later. the ability to make videos by yourself on an ordinary computer at home is a relatively new phenomenon

9.4.17  7:23 pm   How come things that are beyond explanation, other-worldly and not natural are called "supernatural"? 

     in this case, "super" means "more than." you can see this in other words too, like "super-human", or "super-sonic"

9.4.17  7:07 pm   how come you dont play guitar a lot? 

     i am not a guitar player, although i understand that is not necessarily a good excuse

9.4.17  6:36 pm   do you animate your own videos?

     yes

     if so, how long did the entire history of the world video take to make?

     11 months. that also includes the research, writing, narration, and music

9.4.17  5:33 pm   You answered a question recently saying that there's a circles of thirds(if I'm wrong I'm sorry) anyway, are there circles for every distance interval thing? Like is there a circle of 6ths? Circle of 4ths? 2nds? 7ths? That'd be cool if that's true.

     sure, you could think of it that way. any interval when stacked will eventually get back to the same note. 4ths are just reversed 5ths, so the circle of 4ths is really the same as the circle of 5ths. 6ths and 3rds are the reverse of each other if you flip the major/minor, so everything i said about major/minor thirds would basically be true for 6ths as well if you switch the major and minor. it's just the notes will be further apart because they will be in the next octave. major seconds get back to the same note after 6 notes, it's called the whole tone scale, and it is a cliche device for a 'flashback' sort of sound. minor 2nds is just the chromatic scale, and you get back to the same note after 12. 7ths are the inverse of 2nds, again with the major/minor reversed, just like 6ths vs 3rds

9.4.17  4:41 pm   sometimes i think my art thing is not finished, so i try to add more things to make it complete but then it gets to a point where the things i add are detracting from the overall effect. it is hard if not impossible to take things away once they are there. do you ever deal with this,

     yes

     and if so do you have any strategies?

     panic

      any ideas on how i can resist the urge to keep tampering with something in the hopes that i'll make it better, when really i may end up making it worse?

     order a pizza and try to finish the project before the pizza arrives

9.4.17  4:38 pm   are some rocks cooler than other rocks

     we'll leave that to the courts to decide

9.4.17  3:37 pm   what are some good methods I can use to increase my self esteem?

     do a leveraged buyout of a multinational corporation

9.4.17  3:08 pm   what is your favorite type of pumpkin

     type B

9.4.17  2:27 pm   Was hi, it's 1995 written in 1995?

     no

9.4.17  2:07 pm   What are the perks of being bill wurtz?

     i have it written down somewhere

9.4.17  1:40 pm   Did you have an inspiration to start making music?

     yes

     If so who was it?

     it was not a person in particular. it was music

9.4.17  1:36 pm   have the cows come home?

     i will check

9.4.17  1:25 pm   how's progress on the video?

     good

9.4.17  1:19 pm   people are just so interesting!

     i know what you mean

9.4.17  1:16 pm   did the universe create itself?

     i would say so

9.4.17  12:39 pm   what's so great about new canaan?

     i hardly know anything about it but i think it's probably a nice place to live if you have a high annual household income

9.4.17  12:23 pm   What happened during the intermission in hotewig

     just a transition screen, saying 'intermission' with some music, for maybe 1 and a half seconds

9.4.17  12:11 pm   what day is it?

     'today'

9.4.17  11:58 am   Are lobsters mobsters? 

     no, monsters

9.4.17  11:30 am   from the 7/27/13 reality, what's the difference between "minutes of green" and "minutes of blue"

     if i remember correctly that meant minutes of the final product of any content made in each category

9.4.17  11:27 am   Does a picnic just mean eating outside? Or are there other conditions that need to be met before a meal can be considered an official picnic?

     you are supposed to go to the town hall and schedule it

9.4.17  10:49 am   in 2014, you made a video called "help, i'm lost in a calendar". so did you find a way to escape or are you still stuck inside one? it just happened to me and i'd like your advice(if you managed to escape)

     if i were really trapped in a calendar, i wouldn't be making a video with text captions, voice-over, and a musical score. i would be calling 9-1-1

9.4.17  10:23 am   what is your favorite anti joke?

     financial hardship

9.4.17  10:21 am   how do you feel about people doing ~this~ to accentuate or distinguish words online?

     sounds like they are waving their arms when they say the word

9.4.17  9:58 am   39% of your fan base are grilled tomatoes. Thoughts on that?

     i think it's false
9.4.17  9:45 am   what are some of your interests? like favourite film or tv series or song or band

9.4.17  9:23 am   Did you think HOTEWIG would be a big success?

     i suspected it would, but you can never guarantee these things

9.4.17  8:49 am   ive been playing music for five years and when i hear all this music theory clever stuff i get really scared cause im having a tough time trying to mix major and minor chords in my songs what do i do

     always do chords based on the way they sound, not based on what you think they may be called

9.4.17  8:47 am   are you ever afraid to speak your mind outside the expected persona, like you wanna be level and shit, but you don't wanna betray people's expectations?

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

9.4.17  7:30 am   if you don't hate yourself, why did you make a song called "i hate myself"?

     perhaps the same reason a person (not a walrus) made a song called "i am the walrus", or the same reason someone made a song called "i'm my own grandpa"

9.4.17  7:17 am   You often use jazzy electric organ glissandi in your music. Do you have a preference for a particular electric organ sound, be it Hammond, Farfisa, Vox, or even one of those crazy Roland organs with a theatre organ simulation?

     i just use whatever is available. it is much easier to find a way to make music with what you have than to search the world for a certain thing that you think you want

9.4.17  7:11 am   got tips for a new tromboner?

     familiarize yourself with the piano keyboard, even if piano is not your primary instrument

9.4.17  5:57 am   how much time does it take you to answer a question with an audio snippet (e.g. "hide your love away")

     24 seconds

9.4.17  5:43 am   is there such thing as a bad idea?

     all ideas are bad

9.4.17  2:25 am   I am a native New Yorker yet I do not knownhow to pronounce Kozciuszko street. Can you please help. I just pronounce it as 'ko-dnxssddndns-$:!!' or 'kolonoscopy'

     i asked a real polish person, and she told me "kosh-Choosh-co" which is actually exactly the way the recorded announcement on the J train was pronouncing it at the time. i've heard that the australians have a mountain of the same name, and they pronounce it much differently. but when pronouncing the brooklyn street, i defer to the train announcement, and the authentic polish pronounciation, which are both in agreement

9.4.17  2:20 am   is it possible for me to understand the universe. 

     oh hell yeah

9.4.17  2:00 am   can you release the new song first before the video?

     i would like to release them both at the same time
